document.full_text: republicans on wednesday, with few exceptions, stuck by their plan to privatize the medicare health program for the elderly -- despite a rebuke in the senate and a new york special election.
document.title: republicans stick to plan to privatize medicare
lines_and_colors: republicans on wednesday, with few exceptions, stuck by their plan to privatize the medicare health program for the elderly -- despite a rebuke in the senate and a new york special election.
